detailed_results.raw_result:

Buildings line both sides of the street, with some commercial storefronts visible. A red sedan is consistently visible ahead in the same lane, maintaining distance. In the later frames, a single pedestrian becomes visible on the right side of the road, walking along the roadside but not entering the vehicle's path. The driving conditions are clear with good visibility throughout the sequence.",

The vehicle stays centered in its lane with no sudden movements or speed changes required. The driver demonstrates defensive driving by maintaining appropriate spacing from the vehicle ahead and monitoring the road environment. No evasive maneuvers or emergency responses are taken as the traffic situation remains stable and predictable throughout the observed timeframe.",
